sections.summary:
I am seeking a challenging position in management, where I can apply my experience to a company's objective and profits. I have a discipline
approach to the task at hand and the ability to anticipate potential obstacles, which is contributed to a strong record of excellence for getting the
job done safely. I am an optimistic & quick learner, I am safety conscious and have excellent organizational and multitasking aptitude. I currently
plan and lead individuals in order to complete daily tasks in a timely and safe manner.
Highlights
Strategic planning
Qualified to operate and train individuals on various equipment.
Troubleshooting and problem solving
Proficient in Microsoft Office
Flexible
Proficient in Exeter WMS
Dedicated
